let ArticleLikesController = class ArticleLikesController {
    constructor(articleLikesService) {
        this.articleLikesService = articleLikesService;
    }
    async create(req, articleId) {
        const createArticleLikeDto = {
            articleId: +articleId,
            userId: req.user.id,
        };
        return await this.articleLikesService.toggleLike(createArticleLikeDto);
    }
    findAll() {
        return this.articleLikesService.findAll();
    }
    findOne(id) {
        return this.articleLikesService.findOne(+id);
    }
    update(id, updateArticleLikeDto) {
        return this.articleLikesService.update(+id, updateArticleLikeDto);
    }
    remove(id) {
        return this.articleLikesService.remove(+id);
    }
};
